name: Moonlight Miner
description:
You are part of an advanced space team working for the Moonlight Medallion. Your goal is to collect rare resources from asteroids surrounding the planet Stayrthe while avoiding dangerous obstacles.

This game is in a very early stage of development, however I wanted to start sharing my progress early on. Any feedback is greatly appreciated!

Follow us on twitter at https://twitter.com/PlanetStarythe
